Strings.String: Administrator permissions are required to install the Contoso Custom IM Application. Contact your administrator.
Installation of Contoso Custom IM Application and Microsoft Lync 2010 SDK Runtime requires Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5. Contact your application vendor.
Due to an error with Windows Installer, the installation of Contoso Custom IM Application cannot proceed.
Another instance of setup is already running. The running instance must complete before this setup can proceed.
A beta version of Contoso Custom IM Application was detected on the computer. Uninstall any previous beta versions of Contoso Custom IM Application before continuing.
A failure occurred attempting to install Contoso Custom IM Application.
